channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.16 (Build 20251225.1)
item.description:
What's New

Improve build process and engine enhancements

  • Enhanced build_release.sh with better error handling and validation
  • Improved generate_appcast.py script for release management
  • Updated VNEngine with cursor movement tracking improvements
  • Enhanced VNEngineAdvanced with better word processing logic
  • Bumped version in Info.plist

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
